title: Know Who You Are In Christ
itunes:title: Know Who You Are In Christ
description:
The way we see ourselves affects the way we live. In Genesis, we're told God created us in His image. The question is, do you see yourself as made in God's image? Don't let circumstances shape your identity. When you know who you are in Christ, you will be empowered to live victoriously!Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
